item.title: Using an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server with RedwoodJS
item.description: Intro I had several titles in mind for this post: Adding the A to RedwoodJS-style RPG (React, Prisma, GraphQL) with Azure ‚öî (going to pin this one in a corner, just in case) Taking the RedwoodJS tutorial wheels off and using an Azure database üö≤ RedwoodJS ü§ù Azure PostgreSQL Setting up a database with RedwoodJS for noobs: Azure PostgreSQL edition üê§ … And yet, I settled with the most boring one.
